General.Name: ATW Tech Inc
General.Description: ATW Tech Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides financial technology solutions in Canada, the United States, Europe, and internationally. The company offers its solutions through various Web platforms, including VoxTel, an interactive communication, landline, and mobile carrier billing phone solution; Option.vote, a voting system for unions, political parties, professional associations, and others; Bloomed, a cloud-based platform to manage data on consumers and their behaviors; and Semeon, an advanced text analytics platform. The company was formerly known as AtmanCo Inc. ATW Tech Inc. is headquartered in Montreal, Canada.
General.Address: 1050 De La Montagne Street, Montreal, QC, Canada, H3G 1Y8
